title: Uncheck view modes when entering editors

content.raw:
It would be nice to turn off all special view modes (transparent, wireframe, collisions, joints, CoM, contacts) when entering the Model Editor and the Building Editor.

A plus would be to save the current settings before entering the editor and then re-check the saved settings once the editor is exited. (Also save play/pause state; as of now, it forcibly plays when exiting the editor.)

A good place to start would be calling functions like [Scene::ShowJoints](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/66de1887edea28bec5d8b94de5e74f035ac53cc0/gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc?at=default#cl-2866).
